description.short: Initial Program Loader for TI OMAP3530 Beagle board
description.abstract: The ipl-omap3530beagle program is responsible for the first stage initialization of the TI OMAP3530 Beagle board, including initialization of the memory controller, and setting up a serial port for debug purposes. It then scans for a QNX IFS (Image File System) image, and copies that image to memory. Finally, it transfers control to the QNX startup-omap3530 module, which is located at the beginning of the IFS image.
